import React from 'react' import BillDisplay from '../../Bill/BillDisplay' import { BillContext } from '../../Context/Bill' import { useContext } from 'react' function BookingChild(props) { let [bill,setbill]= useContext(BillContext) console.log(props.mode) function confirmTransport(value){ setbill(bill + props.data[value].price) } return (

{props.data.name}

{props.data.vehicleNumber}

{props.data.departureTime}

-{props.data.timeOfTravel}-

{props.data.departureTime}

{props.data.price}

) } export default BookingChild
